channel.title: [RSC2] RS2-like RSC Server
channel.description:
Development will be goal-oriented and a set of milemarker "phases" will be development goals. [img]http://i.imgur.com/cC3Mo.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/14adh0g.png[/img]
-Phase 0: All former RSC-related coding [COMPLETED]. Some very minor issues mostly with item drops or skilling and resource gathering. Some useless NPCs have been removed, some are still not working. All quests seem to be working properly. -Phase 1: Dragon Equips implemented. -Phase 1.5: Skilling (Mining/Smithing/Crafting update and overhaul. Dragon ore, dragon smithing/crafting/fletching, etc.) -Phase 2: New enemy implemented: Kalphite Queen. Stronger than KBD. -Phase 3: Runecrafting -Phase 4: PKing. Combat, equip and class management/balancing. -Phase 5: Rares -Phase 6: Economy balancing (will also occur in more subtle ways in between major phases.) -Phase 7: New Quests. -Phase 8: New Enemies/item drops/everything involved with animation/icon creation. [i]Interphase:[/i] Game balancing, code fixing/compiling and content updating will occur in between each phase. No specific agenda. Fix whatever seems most urgent.
OK, I'm developing an RSC server by myself because you bitches cause way too much drama. No, it's not a Hamachi server and for any of you still using Hamachi, just do everyone a favor and stop playing around on computers right now. You all have massive egos (even you non-hamachi ones) because you learned 5 lines of code in the past 10 years and made something kinda work once (cough xEnt and scoopy or whatever your name is and you 13 year olds who think it's fun to ddos go outside and get a girlfriend little fat boys cough.) But I digress. If you're a PKer and you feel you're going to cry that this server will have RS2 updates (new dragon armor/weapons) [b]click the back button now. [/b] Screw that. None of you get to contribute even if you want to. I'm making this server for myself and opening it up to whoever wants, but nobody gets to contribute shit because too many cooks spoil the stew and you guys can't even light the stove. Here's what the source/compilation of this version has (about 85% done atm if you want to know. Most new content was surprisingly easy to code and was a matter of replacing a variable here and there): [DEVELOPMENT NOTES:] 09/12 -PKing points <-> experience. -Up to Drag armor -REFOCUS: on RSC questing: Implement minor RS2 features into RSC: -Add: Custom made equips: Drag2h, Drag full helm, drag plate. -REFOCUS: on RSC economy: -Rebalance economy because of new content. 09/14 -Add: Dragon mining/smithing. -REFOCUS: on RSC skilling/questing: Old content must be updated. Many crafting/mining features are outdated in comparison to the stage at which RSC became RS2 and you guys couldn't get your heads out of your ass for one second to make it come back.: Skilling must be updated. -Add: Dragon ore, 20 coal, 1 dragon ore. : Maybe new woodcutting/firemaking trees and give firemaking different experience amounts and an actual use. : + Possible update on firemaking skill in the FAR future. It's not really pertinent right now. 09/16 -REFOCUS: On RSC skilling/questing (mining): -Add: Dragon rocks - mining guild, wildy, KBD den, etc. Dragon ore logo (bronze ore recolor), Dragon pickaxe (also able to be smithed.) Also update to the woodcutting skill -> dragon axe for wc. 09/17 -REFOCUS: on RSC skilling/questing (smithing): -Add: Dragon bars, dragon item icons (bronze recolors), dragon items: pickaxe, axe, d2h, drag equips, drag projectile weapons, +++Add Dragonfire shield NPC (Lumbridge). Free Dragonfire shield. +++Add Boots (Bronze, Iron -> Rune, Dragon. [ADDED, +3 STR Weapon Power, +1 Weapon Aim [ADDED][REMOVED][ADDED]. [ADDED/FIXED, wrong damage formula made it not work, but easily fixed.] +++Add Black-equips smithing. [ADDED] 10/23 -REFOCUS: on RSC animation: New items arise need for new icons and in-game item appearance. -Add: New images for new dragon items worn on players. In addition to icons in inventory (mostly bronze recolors. +++Add icons and in-game images to all new content items in the future. [ADDEd, I think] 11/14 -REFOCUS: on RSC warrior/ranger/mage Triangle. -Add: Dragon bow/crossbow. Dragon arrows/crossbolts. : -Extra damage. Goal now should be to reassess the triangle after every update which gives a "class" more power. Are the other two still equal? Mages and Knights still slightly above Ranger/Archer. O9/21 (Started) 11/15 (Finished) -REFOCUS: on RSC warrior/ranger/mage Triangle. : Plate pures. 33 mag requirement. [REMOVED] Plate pure now always possible. -Add: Method to complicate getting map in exchange for plate pure update. [ADDED.] : played around with some quest-related coding in RSCD. Talk-and-fetch item fetch quest/smithing/crafting related item. -REFOCUS: on RSC skilling/questing (crafting/fletching) : How to create dragon bow/crossbow/projectile weapons. Need for dragon logs and dragon ore as previously stated. -Add: Dragon trees, Dragon logs, Dragon log icon. : In game use of icons. + Added dragon trees, mined 31 logs, client crashed on 31. compiled client had no data to use/read and client crashed. Created new icon to use when item falls on floor while skilling. 11/28 -REFOCUS: on Ranger equips: RS2 update. Ranger weaponry : Not just bow/crossbow. -REFOCUS: on Class equipment choices : R2H Primary PKing weapon. RS2 Rune Scimmy Primary PKing weapon. R2H PVE. -Add: RS2 Update : Update equipment choices. Make R2H animation slower. Make RScm animation faster. Battleaxes as well. Mage staffs and shield. No other choices because mages are OP glasscannon as is. 12/14 -REFOCUS: on updated equips and items: +New dragon woodcut axe +pickaxe and whatnot. -REFOCUS: on RSC warrior/ranger/mage Triangle. : + Ranger armor that wasn't added in RSC. -Add: Coif|Head, Hide Body|Body, Chaps|Leg, Vambraces or Ranger (Boots+3Range, Vambraces good defense against magic.)|Feet. Dragon Bow/Crossbow as stated prior. Dragon throwing stars and javelins. Dwarf Cannon will be taken out of the game. Too much drama around that, get over it. No dwarf cannon in game. -REFOCUS: on RSC warrior/ranger/mage Triangle: Warrior>Ranger WarriorWarrior MageMage RangerRanger>Mage>Warrior +Ranger weapons. - Dragon bow, Dragon crossbow, dragon throwing knives, dragon javelins, all corresponding icons.[ADDED/REMADE] Ranger armor that wasn't added in RSC. Ranging/crafting. Dragon killing for hide. Ranging can now be a full time "class" like mage or knight/warrior. Crafting update. -REFOCUS: on RSC skilling/questing (Crafting.) -Add: Dragonhide drops, dragon leathermaking for corresponding Ranger "level range." : Dragonhide equips (coif, vambraces, etc.) Provide ranging bonus [ADDED] Green->Blue->Red->->Black dragons. -REFOCUS: on RSC monsters. : New monster placement. -Add: New green dragons. [ADDED] + Dragons breath now has small chance to curse/poison player each hit. +Add/fix Poison coding. 10% HP dmg/round. -REFOCUS: on RSC equips. : Dragon poison dagger. +6,5% Poison HP/Round. [ADDED] On enemies, lowered to 5% and 2,5%, respectively. With +drag psn dag+ [ADDED/FIXED] 7.5% damage to npc enemies Leathermaking: dragon hide items -> ranger equips. Equips were added already. +++Add: Increase Prayer EXP of Dragon bones 10x [ADDED. Decided to increase exp of all other non-dragon bones (bones, big bones, bat bones) 5x. Maybe add a future option to increase prayer in a different way than just burying in the future, but not pertinent right now.] Make 99 prayer feasible at a fair EXP rate of server (5x) -REFOCUS: on source: EXP Rate: 5x, drop rate 5x, manual editing of item drops to some degree. Point system -> exp, [done] PK point system [done] KBD: Better drag item drops. [ADDED. All Dragon attacks have ability to drain prayer by 10 on top of poison/curse.] -REFOCUS: on RS2 content: Finally, a new challenger appears. KBD is not scary anymore. -Add: KALPHITE QUEEN. [Not done unfortunately] Need help from those with experience in adding custom sprites to the game. Would need a custom image for Kalphite queen or maybe find something online and figure out how to implement. Would be very glitchy movement, but attacks should work fine. : Adding new enemy into source easy enough, making animations work properly difficult. +Prayer Robes adjusted: +15 prayer.

item.title: [RSC2] RS2-like RSC Server
item.dc:creator: @hornyhamster hornyhamster
item.description:
@hornyhamster wrote:

Well There are Definitely some good updates that can be incorporated with RSC.

Clue scrolls, minigames, new bosses/weapons/armor, spells.

But there are also things that would potentially screw up the whole RSC system, like Armor/weapons too strong… Dragon smithing… runecrafting…

I would definitely reconsider Dragon forging… its like Barrows armor being mineable/smithable they should be rare not monopolized by the first 99 lvl smither.

For example you have the KQ added ingame, make it rare rare drop Dragon chain, Rune plate stats with the chain’s ability to use gloves = good addition, mining and smithing full dragon = noobs with no life controlling the market.

if you want dragon smithable make it so you can smith gauntlets… arrows… stuff that will produce money but not monopolize the whole system.

As far as wanting to add “custom sprites” if I were you I would make a giant black spider, scorpion, existing sprite already.

You could change some useless existing sprite, such as the iban disables or soul-less and throw in your own 2d animations, that would save you alot of time since all the sources are coded in such a way that makes it ALOT of work to add new sprites.

I could help you do that, I CBA to take the time to help you add new ones. I do like to make maps though

Read full topic
